MF4 is #2 in Japan In First Week!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Monster Farm 4 (Spoilers!): Reviews, Information on Gameplay, Etc. : MF4 is #2 in Japan In First Week!
By Lisa Shock on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 10:30 am:

MF4 was released on 8/14, and for the week of 8/11-8/17 (so it wasn't even out the full week), it was #2 on the charts! It sold an impressive 96,946 copies. You can see this (this week) at The Magic Box but beware that there are lots of popups, and you do NOT want to accept anything from Gator or Fun Web Products, or any other company that throws an acceptance certificate at you.

For comparison, MF3 sold 182,942 copies in total in the year 2001. Looks like MF4 is well on its way to exceeding that figure! (Monster Rancher 3 sold 72,152 copies total in the US from 2001-2003.)

By John Hawley on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 03:56 pm:

Yippee! Could Tecmo have an actual success story besides DOA? Stay tuned for more on this thrilling story!! ; )

By Monster Fenrick on Tuesday, August 26, 2003 - 08:02 am:

Yeah I saw that chart. So many people I know were shocked to see both "a monster game" and "a soccer game" ranked higher than a Final Fantasy game.
